document.full_text: suspected separatist gunmen ambushed a turkish police escort, killing one officer and wounding two, in northern turkey near where prime minister tayyip erdogan held an election rally wednesday.
document.title: gunmen attack turk police after pm's rally; one dead
lines_and_colors: suspected separatist gunmen ambushed a turkish police escort, killing one officer and wounding two, in northern turkey near where prime minister tayyip erdogan held an election rally wednesday.
